answers.answer: Check his blood sugar during one of the episodes to see if it's low.

question: My brother has type 2 diabeties, he recently has symptoms of dizzyness, lightheadedness, headache, then becomes diaphoretic, then nauseated, and then is very tired and wants to sleep. He has been to primary MD, ENT, Neurologist and has had full cardiac workup,MRI/MRA, CT scan,Carotid ultrasound, lab work, Ber test and hearing test. He is on blood pressure meds and his blood sugars are within normal range. These attacks or what ever they are, happen usually when working, may turn head quickly. He also get double vision.They can not find out what is causing this or what it is related to....It is driving him crazy. They may not happen one day, then may have them the next day.....Please help me.....Do you have any suggestions????Sincerely,Jennifer
title: Could these symptoms be from diabetes
